ygData.subject: RE: Selos and trains underground
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh heh, I have a question do caster s get interrupted every time they are bashed for 1 pt even when they are not stunned?  I know I lose my song whenever
ygData.messageBody:
Heh heh, I have a question do caster's get interrupted every time they are
bashed for 1 pt even when they are not stunned? I know I lose my song
whenever bashed for damage. I nearly died fighting three green no xp
zombies last nite because:

A) Every time I sang Lullaby they all nodded, and all happily
suffered no song
effect and kept bashing away.

B) Every time I tried to start another song I'd get bashed for 1
point of damage
and have to start 'casting' all over again.

C) Couldn't do enough damage to kill 3 green no xp mobs without
spells before
they did 4 bubbles to me.

I mean wtf? True they were barely no xp greens probably, but still. What
good is crowd control if it does absolutely nothing. If Lullaby isn't
broken it is seriously flawed. Last nite was especially bad, more like
John(tm)'s experiences with Kae where every green that nods is unaffected.
I must have nodded mobs over 200 times last nite that kept right on
attacking. I guess they can just fight in their sleep or something. After
four successive nods, a green no xp gnoll reaver finally went to sleep...
for one whole pulse.

Kitasi
-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 12:51 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Selos and trains underground


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> lake, causing trains that are unannounced and very high level. Selo's
> has saved me there a few times, but most times, I die before I even
> know what's going on. No, I'm not bitter at all.

Not bitter huh?

a deathly herald backstabs YOU for 120 damage.
a deathly ancille hits YOU for 60 damage.
a deathly usher hits YOU for 50 damage.
a leering gargoyle bashes YOU for 5 damage.
You are stunned.
.
.
.

Damn I need to stop posting so much today, and get some work
done. hehe.

Harmonic.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
